package com.pizzahut.main;

public class PizzahutApp {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Welcome to Pizza hut");
		Order o=new Order();
		o.getOrder();
	}

}

package com.pizzahut.main;
import java.util.*;
public class Order {
	Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	 VegPizza vp=new VegPizza();
	 NonVegPizza np=new NonVegPizza();
	Toppings topping=new Toppings();
	 CrustType crust=new CrustType();
	 Size s=new Size();
	 int vegPizzaRate,nonVegPizzaRate,sizeRate;
	 float crustRate;
	public void getOrder(){
		System.out.println("Select VegPizza(1) or NonVegPizza(2)");
		try{
		int	choice=sc.nextInt();
		if(choice==1){
			 vegPizzaRate=vp.getVegPizza();
		}else if(choice==2){
			nonVegPizzaRate=np.getNonVegPizza();
		}}catch(Exception e){
			System.out.println("Selected wrong option");
			sc.next();
			getOrder();
		}
		System.out.println("\nDo you want to customize topping");
		System.out.println("Yes (y) or No(n)");
		String custom=sc.next();
		if(custom.equalsIgnoreCase("y")){
			topping.customizeTopping(vp.top.customTopping);
		}
		crust.Crust();
		crustRate=crust.getCrust();
		sizeRate=s.size();
		new Bill(vegPizzaRate,nonVegPizzaRate,crustRate,sizeRate);
	}
	
	
}



package com.pizzahut.main;
import java.util.*;
public class VegPizza {
	public VegPizza vegPizza,Deluxe_Veggie,Panner_Pizza,Veg_Extravaganza,Cheeseburst;
	int Pizza_rate;
	Toppings top=new Toppings();
	Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	public int getVegPizza(){
		System.out.print("1.Deluxe_Veggie: \tToppings");
		System.out.println(top.vegTopping().subList(0, 5));
		System.out.print("2.Panner Pizza: \tToppings");
		
		System.out.println(top.vegTopping().subList(1, 6));
		System.out.print("3.Veg Extravaganza: \tToppings");
	
		System.out.println(top.vegTopping().subList(3, 8));
		System.out.print("4.Cheeseburst: \t\tToppings");
		
		System.out.println(top.vegTopping().subList(4, 8));
		System.out.println("\nPlease Select your Veg Pizza");
		try{
		int choice=sc.nextInt();
		
		switch(choice){
			case 1:vegPizza=Deluxe_Veggie;
					Pizza_rate=350;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.vegTopping().subList(0, 5));
					break;
					
			case 2:vegPizza=Panner_Pizza;
					Pizza_rate=300;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.vegTopping().subList(1, 6));
					break;
			  		
			case 3:vegPizza=Veg_Extravaganza;
					Pizza_rate=300;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.vegTopping().subList(3, 8));
					break;
			  		
			case 4:vegPizza=Cheeseburst;
					Pizza_rate=300;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.vegTopping().subList(4, 8));
					break;
			default:System.out.println("Your had entered wrong option,Please try again");
					getVegPizza();
		}}catch(Exception e){
			System.out.println("Your had entered wrong option,Please try again");
			sc.next();
			getVegPizza();
		}
		return Pizza_rate;
	}
}


package com.pizzahut.main;
import java.util.*;
public class NonVegPizza {
	public NonVegPizza nonVegPizza,Chicken_Supreme,Chicken_Tikka,BBQ_Chicken_Pizza,Chicken_Deluxe;
	public int Pizza_rate;
	Toppings top=new Toppings();
	Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	public int getNonVegPizza(){
		System.out.print("1.Chicken Supreme: \tToppings");
		System.out.println(top.nonVegTopping().subList(0, 5));
		System.out.print("2.Chicken Tikka: \tToppings");
		
		System.out.println(top.nonVegTopping().subList(1, 6));
		System.out.print("3.BBQ Chicken Pizza: \tToppings");
	
		System.out.println(top.nonVegTopping().subList(3, 8));
		System.out.print("4.Chicken Deluxe: \tToppings");
		
		System.out.println(top.nonVegTopping().subList(4, 8));
		System.out.println("\nPlease Select your Non-Veg Pizza");
		try{
		int choice=sc.nextInt();
		
		switch(choice){
			case 1:nonVegPizza=Chicken_Supreme;
					Pizza_rate=350;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.nonVegTopping().subList(0, 5));
					break;
			case 2:nonVegPizza=Chicken_Tikka;
					Pizza_rate=450;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.nonVegTopping().subList(1, 6));
					break;
			  		
			case 3:nonVegPizza=BBQ_Chicken_Pizza;
					Pizza_rate=430;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.nonVegTopping().subList(3, 8));
					break;
			  		
			case 4:nonVegPizza=Chicken_Deluxe;
					Pizza_rate=550;
					top.customTopping.addAll(top.nonVegTopping().subList(4, 8));
					break;
					
			default:System.out.println("Your had entered wrong option,Please try again");
					getNonVegPizza();
	}}catch(Exception e){
		System.out.println("Your had entered wrong option,Please try again");
		sc.next();
		getNonVegPizza();
	}
		return Pizza_rate;
}}


package com.pizzahut.main;
import java.util.*;
public class Toppings {
	List<String> vegTopping=new ArrayList<String>();
	List<String> nonVegTopping=new ArrayList<String>();
	List<String> customTopping=new ArrayList<String>();

	Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	 List<String> vegTopping(){
	vegTopping.add("onion");
	vegTopping.add("capsicum");
	vegTopping.add("grilled");
	vegTopping.add("mushroom");
	vegTopping.add("corn");
	vegTopping.add("Pepproni");
	vegTopping.add("Roasted Garlic");
	vegTopping.add("Green olives");
	return vegTopping;
	}
	 List<String> nonVegTopping(){
		 nonVegTopping.add("onion");
		 nonVegTopping.add("BBQ");
		 nonVegTopping.add("Prawn");
		 nonVegTopping.add("Hot banana Peppers");
		 nonVegTopping.add("garlic chicken");
		 nonVegTopping.add("grill chicken");
		 nonVegTopping.add("Roasted Red Peppers");
		 nonVegTopping.add("Pepper chicken");
		 return nonVegTopping;
	}
	
	 public void customizeTopping(List<String> customTopping) {
			System.out.println("Add new Topping(1) or Replace Existing Topping(2)");
			System.out.println(customTopping);
			int choice = sc.nextInt();
			if (choice == 1) {
				System.out.println("Enter your topping");
				String topping = sc.next();
				addRemoveTopping(topping,customTopping);
			} else {

				System.out.println("Which topping you want to remove");
				System.out.println(customTopping);
				String choice1 = sc.next();
				addRemoveTopping(choice1,customTopping);
				System.out.println("Enter your preferable toppings");
				String choice2 = sc.next();
				addRemoveTopping(choice2,customTopping);
			}

		}
	 public void addRemoveTopping(String topping,List<String> customTopping) {
			
			if (customTopping.contains(topping)) {
				customTopping.remove(topping);
				System.out.println(customTopping);
			} else {
				customTopping.add(topping);
				System.out.println(customTopping);
			}
		}
	 
	
}



package com.pizzahut.main;

import java.util.*;

public class CrustType {
	public String crustType;
	float crustRate;
	int count = 1;
	List<String> crust = new ArrayList<String>();

	Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

	public String getCrustType() {
		return crustType;
	}

	public void setCrustType(String crustType) {
		this.crustType = crustType;
	}

	public List<String> Crust() {

		crust.add(0, "New_Hand_Tossed");
		crust.add(1, "Wheat_Thin_Crust");
		crust.add(2, "Cheese_Burst");
		crust.add(3, "Fresh_Pan_Pizza");
		crust.add(4, "Classic_Hand_Tossed");
		Iterator<String> i = crust.iterator();
		System.out.println("Crust Types:");
		while (i.hasNext()) {
			System.out.println(count + " " + i.next());
			count++;
		}
		return crust;
	}

	public float getCrust() {

		System.out.println("Select your Crust Type");
		try{
		int choice = sc.nextInt();
		switch (choice) {
		case 1:
			setCrustType(crust.get(0));
			crustRate=20;
			break;
		case 2:
			setCrustType(crust.get(1));
			crustRate=30;
			break;
		case 3:
			setCrustType(crust.get(2));
			crustRate=50;
			break;
		case 4:
			setCrustType(crust.get(3));
			crustRate=20;
			break;
		case 5:
			setCrustType(crust.get(4));
			crustRate=10;
			break;
		default:System.out.println("Wrong entry");
				getCrust();
		}}catch(Exception e){
			System.out.println("You had entered wrong option,please check");
			sc.next();
			getCrust();
		}
		return crustRate;
	}
}

package com.pizzahut.main;
import java.util.*;
public class Size {
	Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	public Size getSize(){
		return size;
	}
	public void setSize(Size size) {
		this.size = size;
	}

	public Size size,regular,medium,large;
	int sizeValue;
	
	public int size(){
		System.out.println("Select your size");
		System.out.println("1.Regular");
		System.out.println("2.Medium");
		System.out.println("3.Large");
		try{
		int choice=sc.nextInt();
		switch(choice){
			case 1:size=regular;
						sizeValue=0;
						break;
			case 2:size=medium;
						sizeValue=20;
						break;
			case 3:size=large;
						sizeValue=50;
					break;
			default:System.out.println("Please enter correct option");
					size();
		}}catch(Exception e){
			System.out.println("Please enter correct option");
			sc.next();
			size();
		}
		
		return sizeValue;
		
	}
}


package com.pizzahut.main;

public class Bill extends Order {
 float totalamount;
	public   Bill(int vegPizzaRate,int nonVegPizzaRate,float crustRate,int sizeRate){
		try{
			totalamount=vegPizzaRate+crustRate+sizeRate;
			System.out.println("Totalamount to Pay:"+totalamount);
		}catch(Exception e){
			totalamount=nonVegPizzaRate+crustRate+sizeRate;
			System.out.println("Totalamount to Pay:"+totalamount);
			
		}
	
	}
}
